##### FILE: landr.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/liveread:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: liveread
  name: liveread
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: liveread
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: liveread
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: liveread:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 3
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /readiness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250mi
            memory: 500m

---

  - file_mode=0777
  - vers=3.0

kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: calm-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: latencymeasurement-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: calm-operator
  name: latencymeasurement-editor-role
  namespace: default

- apiGroups:
  - measurement.calm.com
  resources:
  - latencymeasurements
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - measurement.calm.com
  resources:
  - latencymeasurements/status
  verbs:
  - get

kind: Job
metadata:
  name: beam-job-service
  namespace: default

  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: job-service
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: job-service
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/beam-artifact-staging
          name: artifact-staging
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/desktop/mnt/host/c/flink/tmp
        name: artifact-staging
      - configMap:
          name: config
        name: config
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 60

---

##### FILE: law-order-service_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cctns-new/Deployment/psa-law-order-server-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: law-order-app
  name: psa-law-order-server-app
  namespace: cctns-new
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: law-order-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: law-order-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONFIG_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: config_server_address
              name: psa-config-cm
        - name: LAW_ORDER_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: law-order_server_address
              name: psa-law-order-cm
        - name: EUREKA_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: eureka_server_address
              name: psa-eureka-cm
        - name: APPLICATION_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: ACTIVE_PROFILE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: ACTIVE_PROFILE
              name: active-profile
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Kolkata
        image: docker-registry:5000/psa-law-order-server:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: law-order-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9097
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /DATA_APP_C_DIARY
          name: data-app-c-diary
        - mountPath: /DATA2
          name: data2
        - mountPath: /DATA
          name: data
        - mountPath: /root/logs
          name: logs-volume
      serviceAccount: cctns
      serviceAccountName: cctns
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /DATA_APP_C_DIARY
          type: ""
        name: data-app-c-diary
      - hostPath:
          path: /DATA2
          type: ""
        name: data2
      - hostPath:
          path: /DATA
          type: ""
        name: data
      - hostPath:
          path: /Data_NAS_NEW/microservice-log/law-order
          type: ""
        name: logs-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to metallb-system/DaemonSet/speaker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: metallb
    component: speaker
  name: speaker
  namespace: metallb-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: metallb
      component: speaker
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "7472"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: metallb
        component: speaker
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --port=7472
        - --config=config
        env:
        - name: METALLB_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: METALLB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: METALLB_ML_BIND_ADDR
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: METALLB_ML_LABELS
          value: app=metallb,component=speaker
        - name: METALLB_ML_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: METALLB_ML_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secretkey
              name: memberlist
        image: metallb/speaker:v0.9.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: speaker
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7472
          name: monitoring
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
            - NET_RAW
            - SYS_ADMIN
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeSelector:
        beta.kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: speaker
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 2
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master

---

##### FILE: lb-1-cluster-name.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to neo4j/Service/multicluster-lb-neo4j-1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/resource-policy: keep
    meta.helm.sh/release-name: server-1
    meta.helm.sh/release-namespace: neo4j
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-scheme: internet-facing
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-type: nlb
  labels:
    app: multicluster
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    helm.neo4j.com/neo4j.name: multicluster
    helm.neo4j.com/service: neo4j
  name: multicluster-lb-neo4j-1
  namespace: neo4j
spec:
  allocateLoadBalancerNodePorts: true
  externalTrafficPolicy: Local
  internalTrafficPolicy: Cluster
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 7474
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 7474
  - name: https
    port: 7473
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 7473
  - name: tcp-bolt
    port: 7687
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 7687
  - name: tcp-boltrouting
    port: 7688
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 7688
  - name: tcp-discovery
    port: 5000
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 5000
  - name: tcp-raft
    port: 7000
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 7000
  - name: tcp-tx
    port: 6000
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 6000
  publishNotReadyAddresses: true
  selector:
    app: multicluster
    helm.neo4j.com/clustering: "true"
    helm.neo4j.com/instance: server-1
    helm.neo4j.com/neo4j.loadbalancer: include
  sessionAffinity: None
  type: LoadBalancer

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 2, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: lb4_13.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to metallb-system/DaemonSet/speaker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: metallb
    component: speaker
  name: speaker
  namespace: metallb-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: metallb
      component: speaker
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "7472"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: metallb
        component: speaker
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --port=7472
        - --config=config
        env:
        - name: METALLB_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: METALLB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: METALLB_ML_BIND_ADDR
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: METALLB_ML_LABELS
          value: app=metallb,component=speaker
        - name: METALLB_ML_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: METALLB_ML_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secretkey
              name: memberlist
        image: metallb/speaker:v0.9.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: speaker
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7472
          name: monitoring
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
            - NET_RAW
            - SYS_ADMIN
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeSelector:
        beta.kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: speaker
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 2
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource metallb-system/DaemonSet/speaker

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource metallb-system/DaemonSet/speaker failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource metallb-system/DaemonSet/speaker failed:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to neo4j/Service/multicluster-lb-neo4j-4:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/resource-policy: keep
    meta.helm.sh/release-name: server-4
    meta.helm.sh/release-namespace: neo4j
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-scheme: internet-facing
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-type: nlb
  labels:
    app: multicluster
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    helm.neo4j.com/neo4j.name: multicluster
    helm.neo4j.com/service: neo4j
  name: multicluster-lb-neo4j-4
  namespace: neo4j
spec:
  allocateLoadBalancerNodePorts: true
  externalTrafficPolicy: Local
  internalTrafficPolicy: Cluster
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 7474
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 7474
  - name: https
    port: 7473
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 7473
  - name: tcp-bolt
    port: 7687
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 7687
  - name: tcp-boltrouting
    port: 7688
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 7688
  - name: tcp-discovery
    port: 5000
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 5000
  - name: tcp-raft
    port: 7000
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 7000
  - name: tcp-tx
    port: 6000
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 6000
  publishNotReadyAddresses: true
  selector:
    app: multicluster
    helm.neo4j.com/clustering: "true"
    helm.neo4j.com/instance: server-4
    helm.neo4j.com/neo4j.loadbalancer: include
  sessionAffinity: None
  type: LoadBalancer

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to metallb-system/DaemonSet/speaker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: metallb
    component: speaker
  name: speaker
  namespace: metallb-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: metallb
      component: speaker
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "7472"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: metallb
        component: speaker
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --port=7472
        - --config=config
        env:
        - name: METALLB_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: METALLB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: METALLB_ML_BIND_ADDR
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: METALLB_ML_LABELS
          value: app=metallb,component=speaker
        - name: METALLB_ML_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: METALLB_ML_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secretkey
              name: memberlist
        image: metallb/speaker:v0.9.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: speaker
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7472
          name: monitoring
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
            - NET_RAW
            - SYS_ADMIN
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeSelector:
        beta.kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: speaker
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 2
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master

---

      component: controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "7472"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: metallb
        component: controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --port=7472
        - --config=config
        image: metallb/controller:v0.9.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7472
          name: monitoring
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - all
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      nodeSelector:
        beta.kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to metallb-system/DaemonSet/speaker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: metallb
    component: speaker
  name: speaker
  namespace: metallb-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: metallb
      component: speaker
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "7472"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: metallb
        component: speaker
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --port=7472
        - --config=config
        env:
        - name: METALLB_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: METALLB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: METALLB_ML_BIND_ADDR
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: METALLB_ML_LABELS
          value: app=metallb,component=speaker
        - name: METALLB_ML_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: METALLB_ML_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secretkey
              name: memberlist
        image: metallb/speaker:v0.9.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: speaker
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7472
          name: monitoring
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
            - NET_RAW
            - SYS_ADMIN
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeSelector:
        beta.kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: speaker
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 2
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to backstage/Deployment/aws-load-balancer-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: aws-load-balancer-controller
  name: aws-load-balancer-controller
  namespace: backstage
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: aws-load-balancer-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: aws-load-balancer-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cluster-name=backstage-cluster
        - --ingress-class=alb
        image: amazon/aws-alb-ingress-controller:v2.3.0
        name: aws-load-balancer-controller
      serviceAccountName: aws-load-balancer-controller

        app: guestbook-frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        - name: SPRING_CLOUD_GCP_CONFIG_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        - name: MESSAGES_ENDPOINT
          value: http://guestbook-service:8080/guestbookMessages
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: cloud
        - name: GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
          value: /etc/credentials/service-account.json
        image: gcr.io/qwiklabs-gcp-04-93f3ef3ec845/guestbook-frontend
        name: guestbook-frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: metrics
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/credentials
          name: credentials
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: credentials
        secret:
          secretName: guestbook-service-account

---

  namespace: confluent

      labels:
        app: openldap
      name: openldap
      namespace: confluent
    spec:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  name: leader-bot-deployment
  namespace: leader-bot
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: leader-bot
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: leader-bot
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: leader-bot-secret
        image: sealpavel/leader-bot:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: leader-bot
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

##### FILE: leader-bot-ingress.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to leader-bot/Ingress/leader-bot-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: leader-bot-ingress
  namespace: leader-bot
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: leader-bot-service
            port:
              number: 8000
        path: /leader(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific

---
